nimbus-advertise:
Used as link text if the Advertise URL is not empty. Clicking the link will lead to a page where the viewer can get information on how to advertise on the wiki.
{{Identical|Advertise}}
nimbus-editthispage:
This is the "edit" link as used in the Nimbus skin.

{{Identical|Edit this page}}
nimbus-featuredimage:
Used as HTML

heading. This heading is followed by a featured image at random.
nimbus-featureduser:
Used as HTML

heading. This heading is followed by a featured user at random.
nimbus-more-actions: This message is followed by a list of links.
nimbus-more-wikis: This message is followed by a list of wikis.
nimbus-recent-contributors:
Used as HTML

heading. This heading is followed by the message {{msg-mw|nimbus-recent-contributors-info}}.
nimbus-sidebar:
{{ignored}}
Used as Sidebar in Nimbus skin, similar to [[MediaWiki:Sidebar]]
nimbus-specialpages:
{{notranslate}}
Footer link text; the URL of this link will be [[MediaWiki:Nimbus-specialpages-url]]
nimbus-specialpages-url:
{{notranslate}}
Footer link target page; the title of this link will be {{msg-mw|Nimbus-specialpages}}
nimbus-talkpage: In the Nimbus skin this is the text for link to discuss the page, at the bottom of the page for pages in the main, file and video namespaces (excluding the Main Page). Identical to the {{msg-mw|talkpage}} message used by the Cologne Blue skin.
nimbus-welcome:
<b></b> tags are passed as $1 along with the actual username
{{Identical|Welcome}}
Parameters:
*$1 - username, passed in with <b> tags, not used for GENDER
*$2 - username, used for GENDER
